codelist-item.name: Education policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Education sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to education ministries, administration and management systems; institution capacity building and advice; school management and governance; curriculum and materials development; unspecified education activities.

codelist-item.name: Education facilities and training
codelist-item.description: Educational buildings, equipment, materials; subsidiary services to education (boarding facilities, staff housing); language training; colloquia, seminars, lectures, etc.

codelist-item.name: Teacher training
codelist-item.description: Teacher education (where the level of education is unspecified); in-service and pre-service training; materials development.

codelist-item.name: Educational research
codelist-item.description: Research and studies on education effectiveness, relevance and quality; systematic evaluation and monitoring.

codelist-item.name: Primary education
codelist-item.description: Formal and non-formal primary education for children; all elementary and first cycle systematic instruction; provision of learning materials.

codelist-item.name: Basic life skills for youth and adults
codelist-item.description: Formal and non-formal education for basic life skills for young people and adults (adults education); literacy and numeracy training.

codelist-item.name: Early childhood education
codelist-item.description: Formal and non-formal pre-school education.

codelist-item.name: Secondary education
codelist-item.description: Second cycle systematic instruction at both junior and senior levels.

codelist-item.name: Vocational training
codelist-item.description: Elementary vocational training and secondary level technical education; on-the job training; apprenticeships; including informal vocational training.

codelist-item.name: Higher education
codelist-item.description: Degree and diploma programmes at universities, colleges and polytechnics; scholarships.

codelist-item.name: Advanced technical and managerial training
codelist-item.description: Professional-level vocational training programmes and in-service training.

codelist-item.name: Health policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Health sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to health ministries, public health administration; institution capacity building and advice; medical insurance programmes; unspecified health activities.

codelist-item.name: Medical education/training
codelist-item.description: Medical education and training for tertiary level services.

codelist-item.name: Medical research
codelist-item.description: General medical research (excluding basic health research).

codelist-item.name: Medical services
codelist-item.description: Laboratories, specialised clinics and hospitals (including equipment and supplies); ambulances; dental services; mental health care; medical rehabilitation; control of non-infectious diseases; drug and substance abuse control [excluding narcotics traffic control (16063)].

codelist-item.name: Basic health care
codelist-item.description: Basic and primary health care programmes; paramedical and nursing care programmes; supply of drugs, medicines and vaccines related to basic health care.

codelist-item.name: Basic health infrastructure
codelist-item.description: District-level hospitals, clinics and dispensaries and related medical equipment; excluding specialised hospitals and clinics (12191).

codelist-item.name: Basic nutrition
codelist-item.description: Direct feeding programmes (maternal feeding, breastfeeding and weaning foods, child feeding, school feeding); determination of micro-nutrient deficiencies; provision of vitamin A, iodine, iron etc.; monitoring of nutritional status; nutrition and food hygiene education; household food security.

codelist-item.name: Infectious disease control
codelist-item.description: Immunisation; prevention and control of infectious and parasite diseases, except malaria (12262), tuberculosis (12263), HIV/AIDS and other STDs (13040). It includes diarrheal diseases, vector-borne diseases (e.g. river blindness and guinea worm), viral diseases, mycosis, helminthiasis, zoonosis, diseases by other bacteria and viruses, pediculosis, etc.

codelist-item.name: Health education
codelist-item.description: Information, education and training of the population for improving health knowledge and practices; public health and awareness campaigns.

codelist-item.name: Malaria control
codelist-item.description: Prevention and control of malaria.

codelist-item.name: Tuberculosis control
codelist-item.description: Immunisation, prevention and control of tuberculosis.

codelist-item.name: Health personnel development
codelist-item.description: Training of health staff for basic health care services.

codelist-item.name: Population policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Population/development policies; census work, vital registration; migration data; demographic research/analysis; reproductive health research; unspecified population activities.

codelist-item.name: Reproductive health care
codelist-item.description: Promotion of reproductive health; prenatal and postnatal care including delivery; prevention and treatment of infertility; prevention and management of consequences of abortion; safe motherhood activities.

codelist-item.name: Family planning
codelist-item.description: Family planning services including counselling; information, education and communication (IEC) activities; delivery of contraceptives; capacity building and training.

codelist-item.name: STD control including HIV/AIDS
codelist-item.description: All activities related to sexually transmitted diseases and HIV/AIDS control e.g. information, education and communication; testing; prevention; treatment, care.

codelist-item.name: Personnel development for population and reproductive health
codelist-item.description: Education and training of health staff for population and reproductive health care services.

codelist-item.name: Water resources policy and administrative management
Water resources protection
codelist-item.description: Inland surface waters (rivers, lakes, etc.); conservation and rehabilitation of ground water; prevention of water contamination from agro-chemicals, industrial effluents.

codelist-item.name: Water supply and sanitation - large systems
codelist-item.description: Water desalination plants; intakes, storage, treatment, pumping stations, conveyance and distribution systems; sewerage; domestic and industrial waste water treatment plants.

codelist-item.name: Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation
codelist-item.description: Water supply and sanitation through low-cost technologies such as handpumps, spring catchment, gravity-fed systems, rain water collection, storage tanks, small distribution systems; latrines, small-bore sewers, on-site disposal (septic tanks).

codelist-item.name: River development
codelist-item.description: Integrated river basin projects; river flow control; dams and reservoirs [excluding dams primarily for irrigation (31140) and hydropower (23065) and activities related to river transport (21040)].

codelist-item.name: Waste management/disposal
codelist-item.description: Municipal and industrial solid waste management, including hazardous and toxic waste; collection, disposal and treatment; landfill areas; composting and reuse.

codelist-item.name: Education and training in water supply and sanitation
Economic and development policy/planning
codelist-item.description: Institution-building assistance to strengthen core public sector management systems and capacities. This includes macro-economic and other policy management, co-ordination, planning and reform; human resource management; organisational development; civil service reform; e‑government; development planning, monitoring and evaluation; support to ministries involved in aid co-ordination; other ministries and government departments when sector cannot be specified. (Use specific sector codes for development of systems and capacities in sector ministries.)

codelist-item.name: Public sector financial management
codelist-item.description: Strengthening financial and managerial accountability; public expenditure management; improving financial management systems; tax assessment procedures; budget drafting; field auditing; measures against waste, fraud and corruption.

codelist-item.name: Legal and judicial development
Government administration
Democratic participation and civil society
codelist-item.description: Support to the exercise of democracy and diverse forms of participation of citizens beyond elections (15151); direct democracy instruments such as referenda and citizens’ initiatives; support to organisations to represent and advocate for their members, to monitor, engage and hold governments to account, and to help citizens learn to act in the public sphere; curricula and teaching for civic education at various levels. (This purpose code is restricted to activities targeting governance issues. When assistance to civil society is for non-governance purposes use other appropriate purpose codes.)

codelist-item.name: Elections
codelist-item.description: Electoral assistance and monitoring, voters' education [other than in connection with UN peace building (15230)].

codelist-item.name: Human rights
codelist-item.description: Monitoring of human rights performance; support for national and regional human rights bodies; protection of ethnic, religious and cultural minorities [other than in connection with un peace building (15230)].

codelist-item.name: Free flow of information
codelist-item.description: Uncensored flow of information on public issues, including activities that increase the professionalism, skills and integrity of the print and broadcast media (e.g. training of journalists).

codelist-item.name: Women's equality organisations and institutions
codelist-item.description: Support for institutions and organisations (governmental and non-governmental) working for gender equality and women's empowerment.

codelist-item.name: Security system management and reform
codelist-item.description: Technical co-operation provided to parliament, government ministries, law enforcement agencies and the judiciary to assist review and reform of the security system to improve democratic governance and civilian control; technical co-operation provided to government to improve civilian oversight and democratic control of budgeting, management, accountability and auditing of security expenditure, including military budgets, as part of a public expenditure management programme; assistance to civil society to enhance its competence and capacity to scrutinise the security system so that it is managed in accordance with democratic norms and principles of accountability, transparency and good governance.

codelist-item.name: Civilian peace-building, conflict prevention and resolution
codelist-item.description: Support for civilian activities related to peace building, conflict prevention and resolution, including capacity building, monitoring, dialogue and information exchange.

codelist-item.name: Post-conflict peace-building (UN)
codelist-item.description: Participation in the post-conflict peace-building phase of United Nations peace operations (activities such as human rights and elections monitoring, rehabilitation of demobilised soldiers, rehabilitation of basic national infrastructure, monitoring or retraining of civil administrators and police forces, training in customs and border control procedures, advice or training in fiscal or macroeconomic stabilisation policy, repatriation and demobilisation of armed factions, and disposal of their weapons; support for landmine removal). Direct contributions to the UN peacekeeping budget are excluded from bilateral ODA (they are reportable in part as multilateral ODA).

codelist-item.name: Reintegration and SALW control
codelist-item.description: Reintegration of demobilised military personnel into the economy; conversion of production facilities from military to civilian outputs; technical co-operation to control, prevent and/or reduce the proliferation of small arms and light weapons (SALW) - see para. 39 of the DAC Statistical Reporting Directives for definition of SALW activities covered. [Other than in connection with UN peace-building (15230) or child soldiers (15261)].

codelist-item.name: Land mine clearance
codelist-item.description: Explosive mine removal for developmental purposes [other than in connection with UN peace-building (15230)].

codelist-item.name: Child soldiers (Prevention and demobilisation)
codelist-item.description: Technical co-operation provided to government and assistance to civil society organisations to support and apply legislation designed to prevent the recruitment of child soldiers, and to demobilise, disarm, reintegrate, repatriate and resettle (DDR) child soldiers.

codelist-item.name: Social/ welfare services
codelist-item.description: Social legislation and administration; institution capacity building and advice; social security and other social schemes; special programmes for the elderly, orphans, the disabled, street children; social dimensions of structural adjustment; unspecified social infrastructure and services, including consumer protection.

codelist-item.name: Employment policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Employment policy and planning; labour law; labour unions; institution capacity building and advice; support programmes for unemployed; employment creation and income generation programmes; occupational safety and health; combating child labour.

codelist-item.name: Housing policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Housing sector policy, planning and programmes; excluding low-cost housing and slum clearance (16040).

codelist-item.name: Low-cost housing
codelist-item.description: Including slum clearance.

codelist-item.name: Multisector aid for basic social services
codelist-item.description: Basic social services are defined to include basic education, basic health, basic nutrition, population/reproductive health and basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation.

codelist-item.name: Culture and recreation
codelist-item.description: Including libraries and museums.

codelist-item.name: Statistical capacity building
codelist-item.description: Both in national statistical offices and any other government ministries.

codelist-item.name: Narcotics control
codelist-item.description: In-country and customs controls including training of the police; educational programmes and awareness campaigns to restrict narcotics traffic and in-country distribution.

codelist-item.name: Social mitigation of HIV/AIDS
codelist-item.description: Special programmes to address the consequences of HIV/AIDS, e.g. social, legal and economic assistance to people living with HIV/AIDS including food security and employment; support to vulnerable groups and children orphaned by HIV/AIDS; human rights of HIV/AIDS affected people.

codelist-item.name: Transport policy and administrative management
Road transport
codelist-item.description: Road infrastructure, road vehicles; passenger road transport, motor passenger cars.

codelist-item.name: Rail transport
codelist-item.description: Rail infrastructure, rail equipment, locomotives, other rolling stock; including light rail (tram) and underground systems.

codelist-item.name: Water transport
codelist-item.description: Harbours and docks, harbour guidance systems, ships and boats; river and other inland water transport, inland barges and vessels.

codelist-item.name: Air transport
codelist-item.description: Airports, airport guidance systems, aeroplanes, aeroplane maintenance equipment.

codelist-item.name: Storage
codelist-item.description: Whether or not related to transportation.

codelist-item.name: Education and training in transport and storage
Communications policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Communications sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; including postal services development; unspecified communications activities.

codelist-item.name: Telecommunications
codelist-item.description: Telephone networks, telecommunication satellites, earth stations.

codelist-item.name: Radio/television/print media
codelist-item.description: Radio and TV links, equipment; newspapers; printing and publishing.

codelist-item.name: Information and communication technology (ICT)
codelist-item.description: Computer hardware and software; internet access; IT training. When sector cannot be specified.

codelist-item.name: Energy policy and administrative management
Power generation/non-renewable sources
codelist-item.description: Thermal power plants including when heat source cannot be determined; combined gas-coal power plants.

codelist-item.name: Power generation/renewable sources
codelist-item.description: Including policy, planning, development programmes, surveys and incentives. Fuelwood/ charcoal production should be included under forestry (31261).

codelist-item.name: Electrical transmission/ distribution
codelist-item.description: Distribution from power source to end user; transmission lines.

codelist-item.name: Gas distribution
codelist-item.description: Delivery for use by ultimate consumer.

codelist-item.name: Oil-fired power plants
codelist-item.description: Including diesel power plants.

codelist-item.name: Nuclear power plants
codelist-item.description: Including nuclear safety.

codelist-item.name: Hydro-electric power plants
codelist-item.description: Including power-generating river barges.

codelist-item.name: Solar energy
codelist-item.description: Including photo-voltaic cells, solar thermal applications and solar heating.

codelist-item.name: Wind power
codelist-item.description: Wind energy for water lifting and electric power generation.

codelist-item.name: Ocean power
codelist-item.description: Including ocean thermal energy conversion, tidal and wave power.

codelist-item.name: Biomass
codelist-item.description: Densification technologies and use of biomass for direct power generation including biogas, gas obtained from sugar cane and other plant residues, anaerobic digesters.

codelist-item.name: Energy education/training
codelist-item.description: Applies to all energy sub-sectors; all levels of training.

codelist-item.name: Energy research
codelist-item.description: Including general inventories, surveys.

codelist-item.name: Financial policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Finance sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; financial markets and systems.

codelist-item.name: Monetary institutions
codelist-item.description: Central banks.

codelist-item.name: Formal sector financial intermediaries
codelist-item.description: All formal sector financial intermediaries; credit lines; insurance, leasing, venture capital, etc. (except when focused on only one sector).

codelist-item.name: Informal/semi-formal financial intermediaries
codelist-item.description: Micro credit, savings and credit co-operatives etc.

codelist-item.name: Education/training in banking and financial services
Business support services and institutions
codelist-item.description: Support to trade and business associations, chambers of commerce; legal and regulatory reform aimed at improving business and investment climate; private sector institution capacity building and advice; trade information; public-private sector networking including trade fairs; e?commerce. Where sector cannot be specified: general support to private sector enterprises (in particular, use code 32130 for enterprises in the industrial sector).

codelist-item.name: Privatisation
codelist-item.description: When sector cannot be specified. Including general state enterprise restructuring or demonopolisation programmes; planning, programming, advice.

codelist-item.name: Agricultural policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Agricultural sector policy, planning and programmes; aid to agricultural ministries; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified agriculture.

codelist-item.name: Agricultural development
codelist-item.description: Integrated projects; farm development.

codelist-item.name: Agricultural land resources
codelist-item.description: Including soil degradation control; soil improvement; drainage of water logged areas; soil desalination; agricultural land surveys; land reclamation; erosion control, desertification control.

codelist-item.name: Agricultural water resources
codelist-item.description: Irrigation, reservoirs, hydraulic structures, ground water exploitation for agricultural use.

codelist-item.name: Agricultural inputs
codelist-item.description: Supply of seeds, fertilizers, agricultural machinery/equipment.

codelist-item.name: Food crop production
Industrial crops/export crops
codelist-item.description: Including sugar; coffee, cocoa, tea; oil seeds, nuts, kernels; fibre crops; tobacco; rubber. [Use code 32161 for agro-industries.]

codelist-item.name: Livestock
codelist-item.description: Animal husbandry; animal feed aid.

codelist-item.name: Agrarian reform
codelist-item.description: Including agricultural sector adjustment.

codelist-item.name: Agricultural alternative development
codelist-item.description: Projects to reduce illicit drug cultivation through other agricultural marketing and production opportunities (see code 43050 for non-agricultural alternative development).

codelist-item.name: Agricultural extension
codelist-item.description: Non-formal training in agriculture.

codelist-item.name: Agricultural research
codelist-item.description: Plant breeding, physiology, genetic resources, ecology, taxonomy, disease control, agricultural bio-technology; including livestock research (animal health, breeding and genetics, nutrition, physiology).

codelist-item.name: Agricultural services
codelist-item.description: Marketing policies and organisation; storage and transportation, creation of strategic reserves.

codelist-item.name: Plant and post-harvest protection and pest control
codelist-item.description: Including integrated plant protection, biological plant protection activities, supply and management of agrochemicals, supply of pesticides, plant protection policy and legislation.

codelist-item.name: Agricultural financial services
codelist-item.description: Financial intermediaries for the agricultural sector including credit schemes; crop insurance.

codelist-item.name: Agricultural co-operatives
codelist-item.description: Including farmersÂ’ organisations.

codelist-item.name: Livestock/veterinary services
codelist-item.description: Animal health and management, genetic resources, feed resources.

codelist-item.name: Forestry policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Forestry sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; forest surveys; unspecified forestry and agro-forestry activities.

codelist-item.name: Forestry development
codelist-item.description: Afforestation for industrial and rural consumption; exploitation and utilisation; erosion control, desertification control; integrated forestry projects.

codelist-item.name: Fuelwood/charcoal
codelist-item.description: Forestry development whose primary purpose is production of fuelwood and charcoal.

codelist-item.name: Forestry research
codelist-item.description: Including artificial regeneration, genetic improvement, production methods, fertilizer, harvesting.

codelist-item.name: Fishing policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Fishing sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; ocean and coastal fishing; marine and freshwater fish surveys and prospecting; fishing boats/equipment; unspecified fishing activities.

codelist-item.name: Fishery development
codelist-item.description: Exploitation and utilisation of fisheries; fish stock protection; aquaculture; integrated fishery projects.

codelist-item.name: Fishery research
codelist-item.description: Pilot fish culture; marine/freshwater biological research.

codelist-item.name: Fishery services
codelist-item.description: Fishing harbours; fish markets; fishery transport and cold storage.

codelist-item.name: Industrial policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Industrial sector policy, planning and programmes; institution capacity building and advice; unspecified industrial activities; manufacturing of goods not specified below.

codelist-item.name: Small and medium-sized enterprises (SME) development
codelist-item.description: Direct support to the development of small and medium-sized enterprises in the industrial sector, including accounting, auditing and advisory services.

codelist-item.name: Agro-industries
codelist-item.description: Staple food processing, dairy products, slaughter houses and equipment, meat and fish processing and preserving, oils/fats, sugar refineries, beverages/tobacco, animal feeds production.

codelist-item.name: Forest industries
codelist-item.description: Wood production, pulp/paper production.

codelist-item.name: Textiles, leather and substitutes
codelist-item.description: Including knitting factories.

codelist-item.name: Chemicals
codelist-item.description: Industrial and non-industrial production facilities; includes pesticides production.

codelist-item.name: Energy manufacturing
codelist-item.description: Including gas liquefaction; petroleum refineries.

codelist-item.name: Pharmaceutical production
codelist-item.description: Medical equipment/supplies; drugs, medicines, vaccines; hygienic products.

codelist-item.name: Basic metal industries
codelist-item.description: Iron and steel, structural metal production.

codelist-item.name: Engineering
codelist-item.description: Manufacturing of electrical and non-electrical machinery, engines/turbines.

codelist-item.name: Transport equipment industry
codelist-item.description: Shipbuilding, fishing boats building; railroad equipment; motor vehicles and motor passenger cars; aircraft; navigation/guidance systems.

codelist-item.name: Technological research and development
codelist-item.description: Including industrial standards; quality management; metrology; testing; accreditation; certification.

codelist-item.name: Mineral/mining policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Mineral and mining sector policy, planning and programmes; mining legislation, mining cadastre, mineral resources inventory, information systems, institution capacity building and advice; unspecified mineral resources exploitation.

codelist-item.name: Mineral prospection and exploration
codelist-item.description: Geology, geophysics, geochemistry; excluding hydrogeology (14010) and environmental geology (41010), mineral extraction and processing, infrastructure, technology, economics, safety and environment management.

codelist-item.name: Coal
codelist-item.description: Including lignite and peat.

codelist-item.name: Oil and gas
codelist-item.description: Petroleum, natural gas, condensates, liquefied petroleum gas (LPG), liquefied natural gas (LNG); including drilling and production.

codelist-item.name: Ferrous metals
codelist-item.description: Iron and ferro-alloy metals.

codelist-item.name: Nonferrous metals
codelist-item.description: Aluminium, copper, lead, nickel, tin, zinc.

codelist-item.name: Precious metals/materials
codelist-item.description: Gold, silver, platinum, diamonds, gemstones.

codelist-item.name: Industrial minerals
codelist-item.description: Baryte, limestone, feldspar, kaolin, sand, gypsym, gravel, ornamental stones.

codelist-item.name: Fertilizer minerals
codelist-item.description: Phosphates, potash.

codelist-item.name: Offshore minerals
codelist-item.description: Polymetallic nodules, phosphorites, marine placer deposits.

codelist-item.name: Construction policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Construction sector policy and planning; excluding construction activities within specific sectors (e.g., hospital or school construction).

codelist-item.name: Trade policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Trade policy and planning; support to ministries and departments responsible for trade policy; trade-related legislation and regulatory reforms; policy analysis and implementation of multilateral trade agreements e.g. technical barriers to trade and sanitary and phytosanitary measures (TBT/SPS) except at regional level (see 33130); mainstreaming trade in national development strategies (e.g. poverty reduction strategy papers); wholesale/retail trade; unspecified trade and trade promotion activities.

codelist-item.name: Trade facilitation
codelist-item.description: Simplification and harmonisation of international import and export procedures (e.g. customs valuation, licensing procedures, transport formalities, payments, insurance); support to customs departments; tariff reforms.

codelist-item.name: Regional trade agreements (RTAs)
codelist-item.description: Support to regional trade arrangements [e.g. Southern African Development Community (SADC), Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN), Free Trade Area of the Americas (FTAA), African Caribbean Pacific/European Union (ACP/EU)], including work on technical barriers to trade and sanitary and phytosanitary measures (TBT/SPS) at regional level; elaboration of rules of origin and introduction of special and differential treatment in RTAs.

codelist-item.name: Multilateral trade negotiations
codelist-item.description: Support developing countries' effective participation in multilateral trade negotiations, including training of negotiators, assessing impacts of negotiations; accession to the World Trade Organisation (WTO) and other multilateral trade-related organisations.

codelist-item.name: Trade-related adjustment
codelist-item.description: Contributions to the government budget to assist the implementation of recipients' own trade reforms and adjustments to trade policy measures by other countries; assistance to manage shortfalls in the balance of payments due to changes in the world trading environment.

codelist-item.name: Trade education/training
codelist-item.description: Human resources development in trade not included under any of the above codes. Includes university programmes in trade.

codelist-item.name: Environmental policy and administrative management
codelist-item.description: Environmental policy, laws, regulations and economic instruments; administrational institutions and practices; environmental and land use planning and decision-making procedures; seminars, meetings; miscellaneous conservation and protection measures not specified below.

codelist-item.name: Biosphere protection
codelist-item.description: Air pollution control, ozone layer preservation; marine pollution control.

codelist-item.name: Bio-diversity
codelist-item.description: Including natural reserves and actions in the surrounding areas; other measures to protect endangered or vulnerable species and their habitats (e.g. wetlands preservation).

codelist-item.name: Site preservation
codelist-item.description: Applies to unique cultural landscape; including sites/objects of historical, archeological, aesthetic, scientific or educational value.

codelist-item.name: Flood prevention/control
codelist-item.description: Floods from rivers or the sea; including sea water intrusion control and sea level rise related activities.

codelist-item.name: Environmental research
codelist-item.description: Including establishment of databases, inventories/accounts of physical and natural resources; environmental profiles and impact studies if not sector specific.

codelist-item.name: Urban development and management
Rural development
codelist-item.description: Integrated rural development projects; e.g. regional development planning; promotion of decentralised and multi-sectoral competence for planning, co-ordination and management; implementation of regional development and measures (including natural reserve management); land management; land use planning; land settlement and resettlement activities [excluding resettlement of refugees and internally displaced persons (72010)]; functional integration of rural and urban areas; geographical information systems.

codelist-item.name: Non-agricultural alternative development
codelist-item.description: Projects to reduce illicit drug cultivation through, for example, non-agricultural income opportunities, social and physical infrastructure (see code 31165 for agricultural alternative development).

codelist-item.name: Multisector education/training
codelist-item.description: Including scholarships.

codelist-item.name: Research/scientific institutions
codelist-item.description: When sector cannot be identified.

codelist-item.name: General budget support
codelist-item.description: Unearmarked contributions to the government budget; support for the implementation of macroeconomic reforms (structural adjustment programmes, poverty reduction strategies); general programme assistance (when not allocable by sector).

codelist-item.name: Food aid/Food security programmes
codelist-item.description: Supply of edible human food under national or international programmes including transport costs; cash payments made for food supplies; project food aid and food aid for market sales when benefiting sector not specified; excluding emergency food aid.

codelist-item.name: Import support (capital goods)
codelist-item.description: Capital goods and services; lines of credit.

codelist-item.name: Import support (commodities)
codelist-item.description: Commodities, general goods and services, oil imports.

codelist-item.name: Action relating to debt
codelist-item.description: Actions falling outside the code headings below; training in debt management.

codelist-item.name: Relief of multilateral debt
Debt for development swap
codelist-item.description: Allocation of debt claims to use for development (e.g., debt for education, debt for environment).

codelist-item.name: Other debt swap
codelist-item.description: Where the debt swap benefits an external agent i.e. is not specifically for development purposes.

codelist-item.name: Debt buy-back
codelist-item.description: Purchase of debt for the purpose of cancellation.

codelist-item.name: Material relief assistance and services
codelist-item.description: Shelter, water, sanitation and health services, supply of medicines and other non-food relief items; assistance to refugees and internally displaced people in developing countries other than for food (72040) or protection (72050).

codelist-item.name: Emergency food aid
codelist-item.description: Food aid normally for general free distribution or special supplementary feeding programmes; short-term relief to targeted population groups affected by emergency situations. Excludes non-emergency food security assistance programmes/food aid (52010).

codelist-item.name: Relief co-ordination; protection and support services
codelist-item.description: Measures to co-ordinate delivery of humanitarian aid, including logistics and communications systems; measures to promote and protect the safety, well-being, dignity and integrity of civilians and those no longer taking part in hostilities. (Activities designed to protect the security of persons or property through the use or display of force are not reportable as ODA.)

codelist-item.name: Reconstruction relief and rehabilitation
codelist-item.description: Short-term reconstruction work after emergency or conflict limited to restoring pre-existing infrastructure (e.g. repair or construction of roads, bridges and ports, restoration of essential facilities, such as water and sanitation, shelter, health care services); social and economic rehabilitation in the aftermath of emergencies to facilitate transition and enable populations to return to their previous livelihood or develop a new livelihood in the wake of an emergency situation (e.g. trauma counselling and treatment, employment programmes).

codelist-item.name: Disaster prevention and preparedness
codelist-item.description: Disaster risk reduction activities (e.g. developing knowledge, natural risks cartography, legal norms for construction); early warning systems; emergency contingency stocks and contingency planning including preparations for forced displacement.

codelist-item.name: Support to national NGOs
codelist-item.description: In the donor country.

codelist-item.name: Support to local and regional NGOs
codelist-item.description: In the recipient country or region.

codelist-item.name: Sectors not specified
codelist-item.description: Contributions to general development of the recipient should be included under programme assistance (51010).

codelist-item.name: Promotion of development awareness
codelist-item.description: Spending in donor country for heightened awareness/interest in development co-operation (brochures, lectures, special research projects, etc.).
